amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing reasonable accommodations for pregnant workers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 632 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 113.

action.text: Amendment SA 632 proposed by Senator Casey. (consideration: CR S1879-1880; text: CR S1880) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing reasonable accommodations for pregnant workers.
